# Machine

A norns sequencer/computer with 255 instructions.

## Commands

```
00000001 INCR
00000010 DECR
00000011 INCR2
00000101 INCRM
00000110 DECR2
00000111 REST
00001001 INCRO
00001010 DECRM
00001011 RESTM
00001101 INCRM2
00010001 INCRS2
00010010 DECRO
00010011 RESTO
00011001 INCRO2
00011010 DECRM2
00100010 DECRS4
00100011 RESTS
00110001 INCRS4
00110010 DECRO2
01100010 DECRS4
10000000 PLAY
10000001 INCRP
```
